summary.span: 表示要存放在資料庫或從資料庫中擷取之二進位資料的可變長度資料流。

span.span: Represents a variable-length stream of binary data to be stored in or retrieved from a database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免引發`OracleNullValueException`，一定要檢查屬性，才能讀取`Value`屬性。To avoid raising an `OracleNullValueException`, always check the property before reading the `Value` property.
